price: 18. Tą Dieną, jūs būsite išstatyti (teismui), jokia jūsų paslaptis nebus paslėpta.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
